A futuristic city with self-healing infrastructure and buildings that adapt to environmental changes.
A world where technology has reached a point where humans can live underwater, with advanced underwater cities and transportation systems.
A society where virtual reality has become indistinguishable from reality, and people can live out their fantasies in a completely immersive environment.
A planet where plants have evolved to become the dominant species, and humans live in harmony with nature.
A world where time is currency, and people trade years of their lives for material possessions and experiences.
